Module FloWeekTracker

Package com.floweektracker.service

package com.floweektracker.service
Service package contains the business logic of the application responsible for managing user data and application state. Each service class provides CRUD operations. Services act as a bridge between controllers, views and repositories. Controllers call the service methods, services work with the data shown in the views and repositories provide access to the database.

Class overview:

  • CleanerService - handles logic for CleanerView; implemented as a singleton
  • PlannerService - handles logic for the PlannerView; implemented as a singleton
  • TaskNamesService - manages the list of task names and connects to the database via TaskNamesRepository; implemented as a singleton
  • TasksService - manages the tasks using a Map structure and connects to the database via PlannerRepository; implemented as a singleton
  • WeekdayPlannerService - handles logic for the WeekdayPlannerView; implemented as a singleton
See Also:

  • com.floweektracker.view
  • com.floweektracker.repository

    com.floweektracker.controller

    com.floweektracker.model
    Model package contains classes that represent the data used in the application.
    com.floweektracker.repository
    Repositories package contains the data access layer responsible for connecting to the JSON-based storage system.
    com.floweektracker.util
    Util package contains utility classes which are used in multiple classes.
    com.floweektracker.view
    View package contains the UI components of the application responsible for displaying and interacting with the user.
